attributes.action: make income used to fund one's own nursing care, exempt from tax.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If you need nursing care you may have to sell your home to help fund it. Any income from this , and any other income is liable to income tax. The care costs can be more than £35,000 per year. At this rate, an individual who only has enough income to cover a very basic standard of living, is very close to the threshold of 40% tax. This cannot be fair, by any measure.
